title: How-To: Reassemble a UDP Syslog Event
description:
Covers techniques for reassembling multi-line UDP syslog messages that may have been split,
using sequence numbers, message IDs, or buffer functions.

examples.name: Reassemble by messageId
examples.description: Groups fragments by messageId and concatenates them in sequence order.
examples.query:
| groupBy(messageId, function=collectSorted(fragment, sortBy=fragmentIndex) as fragments)
| fullMessage := join(fragments, "")
